title: Code Differ
content:
前置依赖（除 codemirror 外）：

  1. merge.min.js 和 merge.min.css
  2. diff_match_path.js

diff/index.js

/**
 * config compare
 */
import React, { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from 'react';
import Layout from 'components/Layout';
import { Row, Select, notification } from 'antd';
import { get } from 'common/xFetch2';
import DiffView from './diff-view';
import styles from './styles.less';

const { Option } = Select;

const ConfigDiff = ({ location = {} }) => {
  const { record = {} } = location.state;

  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [versions, setVersions] = useState([]);
  const [diffCountArray, setDiffCountArray] = useState([]);
  const [sourceVersion, setSourceVersion] = useState();
  const [targetVersion, setTargetVersion] = useState();
  const [sourceMeta, setSourceMeta] = useState();
  const [targetMeta, setTargetMeta] = useState();
  const [sourceMap, setSourceMap] = useState({}); // source text mapping
  const [targetMap, setTargetMap] = useState({}); // target text mapping

  // get all versions when page loaded.
  useEffect(() => {
    getVersions();
  }, []);

  // fetch source version data when source version changed.
  useEffect(() => {
    if (sourceVersion) {
      getSourceMeta();
    }
  }, [sourceVersion]);

  // fetch target version data when target version changed.
  useEffect(() => {
    if (targetVersion) {
      getTargetMeta();
    }
  }, [targetVersion]);

  // organize source & target mapping data when meta data changed.
  useEffect(() => {
    if (sourceMeta && targetMeta) {
      const { content: srcContent = [] } = sourceMeta;
      const { content: tarContent = [] } = targetMeta;
      const srcPathSet = new Set(srcContent.map((conf) => conf.path));
      const tarPathSet = new Set(tarContent.map((conf) => conf.path));
      const finalPathSet = new Set([...srcPathSet, ...tarPathSet]);
      const srcMapping = {};
      const tarMapping = {};
      srcContent.forEach((conf) => {
        srcMapping[conf.path] = conf;
      });
      tarContent.forEach((conf) => {
        tarMapping[conf.path] = conf;
      });
      setSourceMap(srcMapping);
      setTargetMap(tarMapping);
      setDiffCountArray(Array.from(finalPathSet));
    }
  }, [sourceMeta, targetMeta]);

  // fetch all versions.
  const getVersions = async () => {
    setLoading(true);
    const res = await get(
      `/api/auto/v1/auto-app-components-record/versions?component_id=${record.id}`
    );
    setLoading(false);
    if (res.status !== 'success') {
      return notification.error({ message: res.message });
    }
    const { list = [] } = res.content;
    setVersions(list);
  };

  // fetch source meta data.
  const getSourceMeta = async () => {
    setLoading(true);
    const res = await get(
      `/api/auto/v1/auto-app-components-record?version=${sourceVersion}`
    );
    setLoading(false);
    if (res.status !== 'success') {
      return notification.error({ message: res.message });
    }
    const { content = { content: [] } } = res;
    setSourceMeta(content);
  };

  // fetch target meta data.
  const getTargetMeta = async () => {
    setLoading(true);
    const res = await get(
      `/api/auto/v1/auto-app-components-record?version=${targetVersion}`
    );
    setLoading(false);
    if (res.status !== 'success') {
      return notification.error({ message: res.message });
    }
    const { content = { content: [] } } = res;
    setTargetMeta(content);
  };

  return (
    <Layout title={`版本比较（${record.name}）`} goBack={true}>
      <div className={styles.compareHeader}>
        <div className={styles.compareTitle}>
          <Select
            showSearch={true}
            style={{ width: 350 }}
            placeholder='请选择版本'
            onSelect={(v) => setSourceVersion(v)}
            loading={loading}
          >
            {versions.map((v) => (
              <Option key={v} value={v}>
                {v}
              </Option>
            ))}
          </Select>
          {sourceMeta ? (
            <p>{`${sourceMeta.creator} 于 ${sourceMeta.created_at} 修改`}</p>
          ) : (
            <p>请选择版本以查看信息</p>
          )}
        </div>
        <div className={styles.headerGap}>版本号</div>
        <div className={styles.compareTitle}>
          <Select
            showSearch={true}
            style={{ width: 350 }}
            placeholder='请选择版本'
            onSelect={(v) => setTargetVersion(v)}
            loading={loading}
          >
            {versions.map((v) => (
              <Option key={v} value={v}>
                {v}
              </Option>
            ))}
          </Select>
          {targetMeta ? (
            <p>{`${targetMeta.creator} 于 ${targetMeta.created_at} 修改`}</p>
          ) : (
            <p>选择版本以查看信息</p>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
      <Row className={styles.diffContainer}>
        {sourceMeta && targetMeta ? (
          <div>
            {diffCountArray.map((path, index) => {
              return (
                <Fragment>
                  <div className={styles.confTitle}>{`配置路径: ${path}`}</div>
                  <DiffView
                    key={`${path}-${index}`}
                    sourceText={sourceMap[path] && sourceMap[path].content}
                    targetText={targetMap[path] && targetMap[path].content}
                  />
                </Fragment>
              );
            })}
            <div className={styles.confTitle}>{`发布模板`}</div>
            <DiffView
              sourceText={sourceMeta.deploy_tpl || ''}
              targetText={targetMeta.deploy_tpl || ''}
            />
          </div>
        ) : (
          <p>请选择两个版本进行比较</p>
        )}
      </Row>
    </Layout>
  );
};

export default ConfigDiff;

diff/styles.less

.compareHeader {
  display: flex;
  height: 100px;
  border: 1px solid #c4cdd7aa;
  background-color: #f6f7f8;
  border-radius: 4px;
  align-items: center;
  .compareTitle {
    text-align: center;
    flex: 1;
    p {
      margin: 8px 0 0;
      font-size: 12px;
      color: #4c5a7188;
    }
  }
  .headerGap {
    border: 2px solid #c4cdd7aa;
    border-top: none;
    border-bottom: none;
    width: 110px;
    height: 100%;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 18px;
  }
}

.diffContainer {
  margin-top: 12px;
  :global {
    .CodeMirror-merge {
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      .CodeMirror {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #c4cdd7aa;
      }
    }
  }
  .confTitle {
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
  }
}
